title: Design modern luxury class pocket watch for MEN + wrist watch with pocket mirror for LADY
snippet:
I am looking to create & designs a FAMILY (SET/COLLECTION) of 2 LUXURY watches and 1 pocket mirror:

1. Pocket watch for MEN, 
2. Wrist watch for LADY 
3. Pocket mirror for LADY

The main idea (design/concept) it has to have: 50% Modern/futuristic + 50% Steam punk style details. On the whole we expect it to be modern, fashionable, Steam punk and "cool". 

It should be concentrated on the details of the design of the CASE & COVER of the watch (as the form of watch must be round).  THE DIAL (which must have 3 main things - arrows of minute & hour and days). The main case of watch is planned to be plated gold/silver. 

All detailed info (Logo) I will provide after agreement for job. Also any questions do not hesitate to let me know! Some example pictures of products that attracted our attention are attached!
